filesystem._comment: Enables reading and writing to the PARA data structure in the /data directory.

exa._comment: Neural search for market research, competitor analysis, and prospect deep-dives.

slack._comment: Connects to your Slack workspace for communication and notifications.

hubspot._comment: Syncs client data and pipeline status from HubSpot CRM.

notion._comment: Accesses your Notion workspace for knowledge management and project tracking.

ms365._comment: Integrates with Microsoft 365 (Outlook, OneDrive, SharePoint) for files and email.

clay._comment: Enriches prospect data and automates lead research.

fireflies._comment: Transcribes and analyzes meeting notes from your calls.

stripe._comment: Manages payments, subscriptions, and financial reporting via Stripe.

linkedin._comment: Automates LinkedIn outreach and profile research (configured via Zapier MCP).

figma._comment: Connects to your Figma designs for UI/UX prototyping and design briefs.

stitch._comment: Connects to Google Stitch for advanced UI/UX automation and component management.

tally._comment: Publishes diagnostics as live Tally forms and syncs responses back for scoring. Used by /solo:diagnose share --tally and /solo:diagnose results --tally.
